PropertyList.title: McDonnell Douglas MD-80 Help
PropertyList.text:
Available documentation can be viewed in the "Documentation" menu.
2D versions of certain cockpit panels are included to make certain tasks easier. These can be opened from the "2D Panels" menu.
The Aircraft Config Center can be used to load panel states as well as configure aircraft and ground equipment.
Aircraft Config Center Options: * Keyboard Mode: Maps flight controls to number pad and number rows instead of view shortucts. * Combined Standby: Equips the aircraft with the combined standby instead of split instruments. * Auto Arm Altitude: Equips the aircraft with the optional feature to automatically arm altitude. * Armed Altitude as Flight Levels: Equips the aircraft with the optional feature to show flight level on the FMA. * Use Separate Tiller Axis: Separates the tiller from the rudder and maps it to /controls/gear/steering. * Panel Type: Selects between Analog and EFIS panel layouts. * Flight Director: EFIS panel only, selects between Single Cue (inverted V-bar) or Dual Cue (cross bars) flight directors.
